groupNameI18.name: اولین واریز اسپات خود را انجام دهید
Phần thưởng dành cho người dùng mới
Dành riêng cho người dùng mới!

data.intro:
User eligibility

1. This event is exclusively open to newly registered users on the WEEX platform, with a validity period of 30 days from the registration date.

2. Each individual is limited to participating with one account only. Multiple accounts will be disqualified and receive risk warnings.

3. Users must complete the "Link phone & email" task to access the official interface and claim rewards.

4. Users from the Bangladesh, Nigeria, Uruguay, Sri Lanka, Cyprus, Indonesia, and Thailand regions are not eligible for the Welcome Bonus campaign. WEEX may verify user location at any time and reserves the right to deny or revoke benefits and rewards if the user is found to be ineligible.


Task requirements

1. Only on-chain deposits will count toward deposit task completion. Internal transfers between WEEX accounts do not count toward task completion.

2. Futures trading volume is calculated as margin multiplied by the leverage ratio. Orders that do not generate fees will not be included in trading volume calculations.

3. Upon receiving risk warnings, users must submit valid KYC documents matching their IP region. Verification and approval are required for users to claim rewards.

4. Trading volumes generated from USDC/USDT and EUR/USDT pairs will be excluded and do not count toward any task.

5. You'll qualify for review after your second trade. Once the review is approved, you can claim your trading reward.


Reward distribution

1. Users must claim rewards using the "Claim" button within the validity period. Unclaimed rewards will automatically expire after the deadline.

2. Rewards for new users will be distributed according to their respective regions.

3. Reward distribution details can be viewed in the reward history.

4. Data updates may be delayed. Please wait two minutes and try again if task status has not updated.

5. Tasks involving deposits made to the futures account and futures trading will undergo a 72-hour review period upon completion. Rewards will be issued upon approval and can be viewed in your futures account.


Futures bonus

1. Futures bonuses are funds that are exclusively for futures trading. It is supported for all trading pairs, and cannot be transferred or withdrawn.

2. Futures bonuses can be used as margin for trading and can offset transaction fees, losses, and funding fees.

3. Any transfer of assets out of the futures account before the futures bonus is used up will result in the futures bonus being invalidated.

4. Futures bonuses are valid for seven days. Unused portions will be recalled after expiration. Please be aware and take note of potential liquidation risks.


Position airdrop

1. The position airdrop uses futures bonus funds as margin to automatically open a real futures position (isolated margin, market order) without manual placement. Users may add margin, close positions, and set take-profit/stop-loss orders.

2. If a futures bonus amount remains after closing the position and is still within its validity period, the remaining amount will remain valid for use until expiry.

3. A position airdrop can only be claimed when there are no open positions or pending orders in the selected trading pair. The "position value" equals leverage multiplied by the margin amount, not the actual bonus.

4. If the user already holds a position with the same trading pair, direction, leverage, and margin mode, the bonus will be added to that position. All position airdrops are executed as market orders and take effect immediately upon claiming.

5. The position airdrop futures bonus must be used within its validity period or it will be recalled by the system. The bonus will also be recalled if it is transferred out of the futures account. If a position airdrop remains open beyond its validity period, the system will not close it automatically; the user must close it manually. Positions opened with the bonus cannot be transferred, withdrawn, or used as collateral for other accounts.


Legal provisions

1. WEEX will strictly review bulk registrations, trading volume manipulation, cheating, and other fraudulent behavior. WEEX reserves the right to recover all rewards and disqualify users who engage in fraudulent activity.

2. WEEX reserves the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time without prior notice, including the cancellation, extension, termination, or suspension of this event.

3. In case of discrepancies between translated versions and the English version of these Terms and Conditions, the English version shall prevail.

4. WEEX reserves the right of final interpretation for this event.
